text_logic_form: The line $MP$ bisects the angle formed by the lines $LN$ and $ML$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: The line $MP$ bisects the angle formed by the lines $LN$ and $ML$.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $MN$ is $4x - 2$ units.
The length of the line $ML$ is $3x + 1$ units.
The measure of angle $LPM$ is $5y$ degrees.
Point $P$ lies on the line connecting $L$ and $N$.
line_instances: There are lines $LN$, $ML$, and $MN$, forming the equilateral triangle $LMN$.
The line $MP$ bisects the angle formed by the lines $LN$ and $ML$.
